dialogue:
Do I have any friends? I'm guessing at least one of the
[color=#b38b2b]Dollhouse[/color] residents should be familiar with me, since [color=#b38b2b]Darling[/color]
said they were waiting for me to come back.
I'd have to leave first to return home...

That person I remembered before seemed the closest to me. I
can remember bits and pieces of them, and most of my
memories include them. But only them.

The only time they werenâ€™t smiling was when they were scowling
at someone for getting one of my spare cookies from our baking
sessions.

I teased them about it. They told me I should only give my
spares to them. How silly.
